name: TRICK OR TREAT (CHIMPS)
description:
Collect candies from houses! be careful though, it's dangerous...

W A S D to move

SHIFT to sprint

Collect as many Candies as you can!

.

.

.

Collect 7 keys to escape or you will die.

Every 30 seconds your health will deplete.

Good luck.
